title: Mateo Kovačić
summary: Mateo Kovačić (Croatian pronunciation: [matěo kǒʋatʃitɕ];[4][5] born 6 May 1994) is a Croatian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Premier League club Chelsea and the Croatia national team. He is usually deployed in a central or box-to-box role, but can play in deeper positions. He also adapted to playing either wide on the left or as an attacking midfielder earlier in his career.[6]
